turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Where is the closest Starbucks to me right now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The closest Starbucks is located on the Nova Southeastern Campus.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What are their hours of operation?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They are open 24 hours a day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Id like you to put in an order for me to be picked up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like me to get.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Id like two chai lattes with almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many pumps would you like of chai?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want 10 pumps in each of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like them to be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want both of them to be venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else that you would like.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I also need to get two venti creme brulee lattes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk with those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want those with soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like whipped cream on that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No whipped cream on those.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would that be it for this order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that will be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How will you be paying.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will be paying with my gift card that I have on file.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I will let you know when your order is ready to be picked up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Youre welcome.
